message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I think you'll find it meets your needs and exceeds your expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $12000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11000.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $10500. This is my final offer.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to meet you at $11200, but I'm not going any lower.
